title: Gold not showing up after last hitting
body: Hello, I've had this issue where gold wont show up after last hitting for a very long time, no matter what i do nothing seems to fix it and I've tried every option i could (yes i have tried to delete config and my gold showing is enabled in my options). I deleted config I've uninstalled I've used the hextech repair tool and nothing seems to get it to work. So I will now try to take it public to try and get more options to fix this long lived problem.

replies.body:
Sometimes you need to take very specific steps to make sure your config file is fully reset. Do me a favor and try this out really quickly....

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Give that a go and your config files should be manually reset, and then you should be able to get those numbers showing again.
